programme.title: End of the fiscal year, 1990
programme.short_synopsis: The appointment of Justice David Souter and the end of the fiscal year for 1990.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Columbus Day parade, the closure of National parks and museums due to the end of the fiscal year and the start of a new budget, and the appointment of Justice David Souter.
